wikipedia_page.main: Sir Michael Aron Heller (born July 1936) is a British business executive and philanthropist.

response: * Lady Morven Heller (born 1940), British philanthropist and wife of Sir Michael Heller
*Michael Heller (poet) (born 1937), American poet, essayist and critic

*Michael Heller (businessman) (born 1936), British business executive and philanthropist
